lines.text: [first lines]

[Elmer is seen dripping chemicals into a test tube]
I'm trying to make the formula that will change a normal character into a deviwish fiend.
[makes pointy-eared face and green eyes for emphasis]
Hahahaha.

[watching Elmer's reaction to drinking his own formula]
I think Spencer Tracy did it better, don't you, folks?

[Elmer hands Bugs a formula in a test tube]
Uh, have one on the house, wabbit.
No thanks, Doc. Never touch this stuff.
[to audience]
This guy's tryin' to slip me a mickey!
Now, wabbit! Dwink!
Hey, don't do it, Doc! Cut it out! Hey, Doc, don't, don't!
[Elmer shoves the formula down Bugs' throat, and Bugs reacts by breathing smoke, and going into a seizure]
At wast! Success! He's gonna turn into a gwuesome monster!
[Bugs covers his eyes, panting, and suddenly turns normal again]
No soap, Doc.

[crying]
Oh, it don't work! It doesn't work, I'm a tewwible scientist!
[pounds on table]
Oh, this is tewwible, I tried my best, and...
[bangs head against wall while wailing]
...it won't work!

Can you imagine? An old-fashioned rabbit trap. My grandfather told me about them, but I never thought I'd actually see one. Oh well, someone went to a lot of trouble. I won't dissapoint them. I can go along with the gag.
